data.text:
@frankgr90626724 @JonS62528931 @disenthralaus That was the original one some got confused by, clarification here, where it's spelled out more clearly,

https://t.co/p5DfUi94zm

@linda_mafrici @ArtysHouse @JonS62528931 No. That's not what it means.
There was one set of tests that detected SARS-COV-2 and NO other virus 

There was a second set of tests that detected flu viruses and NO other. 

Now there's a combined test that detects both and lights up in a different colour for each virus
@ArtysHouse @JonS62528931 So  that means for 2years it couldn't distinguish between the 2 🙄

@JonS62528931 The CDC didn't pull the PCR testing 

That'd be the main reason

@JonS62528931 @disenthralaus Well your a dummy aren’t you!
PCR test denounced by WHO - can’t tell the diff between a cold and virus - sounds like you got a flu - just like everyone did last 26 months- what a bunch of fake liars we have in Govt - read ABS stats on deaths. -complete joke https://t.co/YH13h3mMMW

@JonS62528931 No, the CDC didn't pull them because they couldn't tell the difference. They stopped using them because they created a 2 in 1 test which can be used for SARS-CoV-2 and influenza detection

https://t.co/DfyZedu5u2
